text: @PressSec @realDonaldTrump And two months later we have 700k plus sick & 40k plus dead ..... his Criminally Negligent COVID19 response has only tested 1.3% of the US population. WTF has he been doing  1.3%. 1.3%  let that sink in. You think he has done anything worth talking about on TV for hours everyday?
